column1: Little Goat Diner////If you're going out to eat
column5: it's important that you can hear your conversations. The music here is a good level; you can hear it
column6: but it doesn't impede conversations. It's tasteful and in tune with the vibe of the diner. The place is well-decorated and gives a good feeling of openness. It's good for going out with the girls or the guys
